name: Brandfire Marketing Group Inc.
description:
Brandfire is a mid-size, full-service marketing agency. We are proud to be recognized as one of Canada's fastest growing companies by Profit 500: 2014 & 2015. 
 
Operating on the foundation of the 6 C's Brandfire is an agency which strives to achieve close-knit relationships with their clients. Brandfire achieves this goal through strategic thinking, powerful creative, and a family-like, synergistic environment; and of course, a willingness to always strive to be the best.
